hint.text: The size of each sector is proportional to the activity or information it represents.

solution.text:
Observe the pie chart carefully,
the students spends \(20\) percent of the total amount on fabrication.
Total expenditure on fabrication \(=\frac {20}{100} \times _{j}_\)
\(=_{{(Decimal(str(0.2)))*j}}_\)
Therefore, total expenditure on fabrication is Rs.\(_{{(Decimal(str(0.2)))*j}}_\).

content.text: How much money did he spend on fabrication?
